body: This drove me fucking insane on reddit, god damn.

title: Admins deserve more credit for this

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Yeah, reddit admins are completely stupid about this. Even though it's something they can easily change by typing just a few lines in the python shell. Same with recovering deleted accounts.
body_html: Yeah, reddit admins are completely stupid about this. Even though it's something they can easily change by typing just a few lines in the python shell. Same with recovering deleted accounts.
